summary: This bill, the Child and Dependent Care Tax Credit Enhancement Act of 2025, aims to improve the Child and Dependent Care Tax Credit. It modifies the applicable percentage calculation based on adjusted gross income, increases the dollar limits on creditable expenses, and introduces an inflation adjustment. The bill also makes the credit fully refundable for certain taxpayers and specifies adjustments for married couples filing separately. The amendments are effective for taxable years beginning after December 31, 2024.
